articles.title: Galaxy Z Flip 7 Was Rumored To Ship With The Exynos 2500, But Has Apparently Passed All Of Samsung’s Internal Tests With The Snapdragon 8 Elite Instead - Wccftech
articles.description: An Exynos 2500 might not be found in the Galaxy Z Flip 7 after all, as the clamshell foldable is rumored to be tested with the Snapdragon 8 Elite
articles.content: The Exynos 2500 was previously reported to be undergoing some optimizations, which would allow Samsung to launch the SoC in the second half of 2025. While a rumor was doing the rounds claiming that t… [+2209 chars]
